name: Modular Mayhem
description:
After a routine space delivery goes wrong, you're left stranded in an asteroid field with no weapons, no engines, and no hope.
Will you be able to survive long enough to rebuild your ship, and, more importantly, complete your delivery?

(A bit of advice - try not to stray too far from the Big Ship)

------------------------------------------------------------

Controls:

WAD to move and steer
S to brake
Left click to shoot all weapons
Left click on a module to eject it

------------------------------------------------------------

Made with Unity
Models made with Blender
Some SFX made with Bfxr

------------------------------------------------------------

Made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 45. The theme was "Start with Nothing."
